description:
"Modern educational technology" is a public compulsory course for college students, basic theory and technical requirements of the master of educational technology, set up the new ideas and new concepts of education informatization, educational technology ability is the integration of disciplines in the teaching activities.
The main contents of this course include the acquisition and processing method of teaching resources, teaching design, teaching materials and video tutorial courseware. Course of study need 36 hours to complete the foundation of learning time, curriculum knowledge points for the support mission, finally completed the design of multimedia PPT courseware for teaching and comprehensive task.
title: 现代教育技术
instructors: 曲靖师范学院张忠玉教学团队 吕琼 刘倩 柳雪莲
